title: Advice to a Prophet - describes poem as a whole

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the poem as a whole?

choices.label: A poetic expression of the need for love to give meaning to life
A lyrical celebration of the importance of nature for human beings
A personal meditation on human courage in the face of destruction
A philosophical poem about human beings and nature

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
